title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-3.3 - Eligibility determinations for SSPNA
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-3.3 - Eligibility determinations for SSPNA
State Regulations

An individual's or couple's initial and ongoing
eligibility for SSPNA is established based upon the data supplied by the
federal SSA through the SDX and information available to the Office. The Office
is bound by the decisions and actions taken by SSA on the SSI eligibility
determination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-3.3

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
